specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Dye Method > PFD / BO The fabric which is prepared for dyeing or print.
specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
